content:
In addition, the occupiers have improved, modernized and restored 2,300 cultural objects: theaters, cinemas, various studios for imposing narratives of the Russian Federation, depriving us of the historical past.

About thisdeclared March 29Representative of the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense Vadim Skibitsky during a discussion on Kyiv Stratcom forum 2024, organized (https://spravdi.gov.ua/) Center for strategic communications.

“Let's take Lugansk, Donetsk, Kherson and Zaporizhzhya regions. They (the occupiers, the ed.) Completely control this information space, using repeaters and more. This is assigned to Rostech: there is all the software, full control of all the information flows that are there, ”Vadim Skibitsky said.

According to him, the invaders are actively expanding the networks in order to spread their propaganda. Yes, they have launched and installed more than 2000 towers of the mobile networks of the Russian Federation.

Earlier about Russian expansion in Africa and Latin AmericaThe Armyinform was told by the expert.
title: In the occupied territories of Ukraine, the Russians have installed more than 2000 of their towers
description: This was stated on March 29 by the representative of the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense Vadim ...
author: Army Inform
